amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-487 to require any new or amended energy conservation standard to take into consideration rural populations, cost of living comparisons, and climatic differences.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzales, Tony amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Gonzales, Tony.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gonzales, Tony amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
